title: Ep227 Law and Order SVU Crimes
description:
This week, the gals indulge in some cases featured in a classic guilty pleasure show. Topics include the dirty past of Dick Wolf, a creepy little light that led to decades of pain, and a troublemaking tumor. Pour a glass of Winc's Mercana Cabernet Sauvignon in honor of Captain Olivia Benson, lock your bedroom window, and tune in for Law & Order: SVU Crimes. DUN-DUN!

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
